price: （夜か昼かを問わず、）あなたの主*の御名を唱念し、かれ（の崇拝*）に完全に専念せよ。
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَبۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kuri is'ma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabtīlan
